snippet: Polls show that North Carolina voters are likely to pass an amendment to the state's constitution banning same-sex marriage and all domestic partnerships - but also that there is some confusion about what the amendment says.
abstract: Polls show that North Carolina voters are likely to pass an amendment to the state's constitution banning same-sex marriage and all domestic partnerships - but also that there is some confusion about what the amendment says.

headline.main: North Carolina's Ban on Gay Marriage Appears Likely to Pass
